Description: Green glazed composition shabti with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, the hands are missing, two incised hoes and a seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar; the foot has broken away.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Nebesheh and Defenneh (Tanis II), 36 and Pl. xii (No.22) See also 1887,0101.291
